TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PolyBezierSegment extends System.Windows.Media.PathSegment
Public NotInheritable Class PolyBezierSegment Inherits PathSegment
public ref class PolyBezierSegment sealed : System::Windows::Media::PathSegment

summary.span: 表示一條或多條三次方貝茲曲線。

span.span: Represents one or more cubic Bezier curves.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用物件來儲存物件和其他區段。Use a object to store objects and other segments. 由四個點定義三次方貝茲曲線︰ 起點、 結束點和兩個控制點。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by four points: a start point, an end point and two control points. A藉由設定指定一或多個三次方貝茲曲線點集合的屬性。A specifies one or more cubic Bezier curves by setting the property to a collection of points. 集合中每隔三個點，第一個和第二個點指定曲線的兩個控制點，和第三個點指定的端點。For every three points in the collection, the first and second points specify the two control points of the curve and the third point specifies the end point. 請注意，因為起始點的最後一個區段的結束點相同，會指定沒有曲線的起始點。Note that no start point for the curve is specified because start point is the same as the end point of the last segment. 三次方貝茲曲線的兩個控制點作用類似磁鐵，吸引原本為直線的部分，並產生曲線。The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve. 第一個控制點會影響曲線; 的開頭部分第二個控制點會影響曲線的結束部分。The first control point affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point affects the ending portion of the curve. 請注意，曲線並不一定是通過其中一個控制點;每個控制項點是移到本身，而不是透過本身的行那部分。Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用繪製兩個三次方貝茲曲線。The following example shows how to use a to draw two cubic Bezier curves. [!code-xaml[GeometriesMiscSnippets_snip#PolyBezierSegmentExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeometriesMiscSnippets_snip/XAML/PolyBezierSegmentExample.xaml#polybeziersegmentexamplewholepage)] [!code-csharp[GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#PolyBezierSegmentCodeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/PolyBezierSegmentExample.cs#polybeziersegmentcodeexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#PolyBezierSegmentCodeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/polybeziersegmentexample.vb#polybeziersegmentcodeexamplewholepage)]
